name: Refrigerator LG GBB61DSHMN Dark Silver
origAbout: LINEARCooling™ reduces temperature fluctuations, locking in the flavor of fresh for up to 7 days. Consistent temperatures are the key to food freshness. LG took its advanced freshness system one step further by adding Door Cooling+ to provide a steady supply of cold air to help keep door contents at peak freshness. DoorCooling+™ delivers freshness evenly & faster. Food stays fresh and drinks get ice cold on any shelf with even and faster cooling performance.
